name: Her 她
description: This is a antique style game with TCG & LVG ,you need to carry out the character training of Katie (heroine) in 90 days and finish all the plots. There are 21 endings.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: Pixelshader 3.0 enabled graphics card(DirectX 10 capable graphics card) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
